axis.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the imaginary line around which a large round object, such as the Earth, turns
axis.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The Earth rotates on an axis between the north and south poles.
axis.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a line drawn across the middle of a regular shape that divides it into two equal parts
axis.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: either of the two lines of a graph, by which the positions of points are measured
axis.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the countries, including Germany, Italy, and Japan, who fought together during World War II against the Allies.
